title: Anestis Taverna
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Greek taverna with traditional Greek cuisine. Menu includes multiple vegan and/or veganizable starters such as fava (split pea puree), gigantes (beans in tomato sauce), fried potatoes and eggplant salad. Main course salads can be made vegan. Located on the roadside near multiple hotels. Parking available right across the road. Casual atmosphere. Waitress speaks English.
